started.description: players take turns (and are scored) in rounds

playing.description: players take turns (and are scored) in rounds

round.description: all players take one turn in order

roundInitialised.description: turns are sorted into the correct order based on game configuration and preceding rounds

turns.description: turns are taken scored and scored in order

roundFinalised.description: rankings are worked out for the round and over all. each turn is stored in the list of all turns for the game

paused.description: Players cannot have a turn out have their turn scored. However, players can be added to, or removed from, the game
